fields_of_interest: Trade, Research and innovation, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Ripple is following the development of the European Commission's Blockchain Observatory and Forum, including representation from the European Parliament.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Ripple provides one frictionless experience to send money globally using the power of blockchain. By joining Ripple’s growing, global network, financial institutions can process their customers’ payments anywhere in the world instantly, reliably and cost-effectively. Banks and payment providers can use the digital asset XRP to further reduce their costs and access new markets.
